scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Lamentation of Christ, with the body of Christ, showing wounds, lying across the lap of the Virgin Mary. She is dressed in a dark veil and gown, her face conveying sorrow. Surrounding them are four other women, also in mourning attire, their expressions reflecting grief and compassion. The figures are arranged in a close grouping, emphasizing their shared sorrow. The background is plain, focusing attention on the emotional weight of the scene.
